sentences.sContent: Ideas about the social significance of religion have changed over time.
sentences.sCn: 有关宗教的社会意义的观念已随时间的流逝发生了改变。

sentences.sContent: ...I firmly believe that listening is of greater significance than talking...
...The giant panda has special significance for WWFin that it has been the organization's symbol since 1961 when WWF was founded...
...to recognize the significance of the act...
...which help to clarify and give significance to their own...
...The social and educational significance of the readers’ books cannot be overestimated in an academic library...
...Through their reading they find a deeper significance to life as books acquaint them with life in the world as it was and it is now...

phrases.pCn: 显著性检验；显著性测定

words.tran: 重大的；有效的；有意义的；值得注意的；意味深长的
有意义的；表示…的；为…提供推定证据的
意味深长地；值得注目地
有重要性；要紧；冒充内行

trans.tranOther: The significance of something is the importance that it has, usually because it will have an effect on a situation or shows something about a situation
